title: Cron Step Configuration
description: Scheduled cron job that runs every 10 minutes to monitor campaign health, performance, and generate alerts for issues.

title: Campaign Health Analysis
description: Monitors active campaigns and calculates health scores based on delivery rates, bounce rates, and processing time.

title: Alert Generation System
description: Generates alerts for low delivery rates, high bounce rates, slow processing, and other campaign issues with severity levels.

title: Health Report Generation
description: Generates comprehensive health reports for each campaign with metrics and system health scores.

title: Stuck Campaign Detection
description: Detects campaigns stuck in processing for extended periods and marks them as failed if necessary.

title: Campaign Completion Tracking
description: Updates campaign completion status and handles campaign lifecycle management with proper state transitions.
